mods.abstract: Mastaba Tomb of Ti at Sakkara (Old Kingdom Dynasty V); hieroglyphs inscribed broken columns within a sunken brick enclosure, six Egyptian men stand in ruins; one man crouches in sands (background); "No 137 Saqqarah, Tombeau de Ti. H. Bechard." in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
